page.title: 06 FARMING - COTTAGE FARM
page.content: {Cottage Farm}is one of the more recent farming developments in the area having been in existence only 5 years. It covers an area of 10 acres and rents a further 25 acres of grazing land. There are 12 turkey sheds, an office, 3 stores, 1 cattle shed and a butchers shop on the site. {Turkeys and beef cattle are reared for sale}. The turkeys are bought in as day old chicks and are sold at 4-5 days as "growers" or reared to maturity and sold for the table at Christmas. Beef calves are bought locally at 1 week old fattened for sale as freezer packs at about 24 months. The farm has one full-time employee and up to 20 part-time workers are taken on at Christmas-time. A part-time butcher is also employed. A grass crop is maintained for summer grazing and hay making.
